definition: to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially

sentences.english: The circumference of the earth is almost 25,000 miles.
sentences.chinese: 地球的圓周長約爲兩萬五千英里。

sentences.english: North Korean forces attempted to break through the Pusan perimeter.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮勢力企圖突破釜山周長。

sentences.english: For special transport equipments. The products are endless.
sentences.chinese: 專用輸送機械設備，產品無接頭，環形周長。

sentences.english: The recruit made the current circulate in the circuit on the circumference.
sentences.chinese: 新兵使電流在周長上在電路內循環。

sentences.english: Averages are more like 16 feet (5 meters) and 110 lbs (50 kg).
sentences.chinese: 通常這類章魚周長只有5米多，體重50公斤。

sentences.english: The earth's circumference is more than 40000 kilometres.
sentences.chinese: 地球的周長爲四萬多公里。

sentences.english: The color Doppler jet area and circumference of all jets were also increased.
sentences.chinese: 彩色多普勒示返流及分流束的面積和周長均增加。

sentences.english: The island is five miles around.
Figure out the perimeters and area sizes of the following pictures.
sentences.chinese: 計算下面圖形的周長和麪積。

sentences.english: Ancient 12-meter (40 foot) high walls ring the city over a perimeter of six kilometers (3.7 miles).
sentences.chinese: 環繞城鎮的城牆有12米高，周長6公里。

sentences.english: The gravel-pit was very large, with grass and wild flowers round the sides at the top.
sentences.chinese: 礫石坑大極了，坑口四周長着青草和野花。

sentences.english: Class defines a circle, calculate area and circumference of a circle.
sentences.chinese: 定義一個圓類，計算圓的面積和周長。

sentences.english: There were slight differences in arch perimeter and midpalatal suture separation.
sentences.chinese: 在牙弓的周長和齶中縫打開上略有差異。

sentences.english: Measure all points on the curved shape and automatically find area, perimeter and volume.
sentences.chinese: 測量所有點的彎曲形狀和自動尋找面積，周長和數量。

sentences.english: finding right triangles with a certain circumference.
sentences.chinese: 給定周長尋找直角三角形。

sentences.english: The tree has a circumference of 6 feet.

definition: further math/advanced mathematics (school subject, abbr. for 高等數學|高等数学)
Manas, hero of Kyrghiz epic saga/Manas county and town in Changji Hui autonomous prefecture 昌吉回族自治州[Chang1 ji2 Hui2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Xinjiang
Mt Maiji Caves at Tianshui 天水, Gansu
Lhasa, Tibetan: Lha sa grong khyer, capital of Tibet autonomous region 西藏自治區|西藏自治区[Xi1 zang4 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]
external diameter (including thickness of the wall)
to cross (a road, an ocean etc)/to cut across
